description: Short code identifying the warranty category/type used as a lookup key.
Human-readable description of the warranty type for displays and reports.
User ID or process that created this warranty type record.
Timestamp when this warranty type record was created.
User ID or process that last modified this warranty type record.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this warranty type record.
Narrative of the components/systems and scope covered by this warranty type.
Maximum usage threshold covered, typically an odometer/hours limit; confirm unit with SME.
Maximum coverage duration expressed in years.
Maximum coverage duration expressed in months.
Maximum coverage duration expressed in days.
Free-text notes, exclusions, or special conditions for this warranty type.
Contact phone number for warranty inquiries or claims.
URL for warranty information, registration, or claims submission.
Custom field A for client-specific attributes; meaning varies by implementation.
Custom field B for client-specific attributes; meaning varies by implementation.
Number of days within which a refund is eligible under the warranty; confirm rule with SME.
Allowed number of days to return defective items for warranty service or credit; confirm with SME.
Number of days within which a replacement may be issued under the warranty; confirm with SME.
Indicator whether a Return Material Authorization is required before returns.
Indicator whether a loaner vehicle/equipment is provided during warranty repair.
Indicator whether warranty repair is performed at the assetâ€™s location.
Indicator whether remaining warranty transfers to a new owner upon asset sale.
